metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8866 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to create arbitrary files on affected installations of Horde Groupware Webmail Edition 5.2.22. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability. The specific flaw exists within add.php. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can allow the upload of arbitrary files. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to execute code in the context of the www-data user. Was ZDI-CAN-10125.

criterions.comment: php-horde-form: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
